mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RN , P.* FROM ( SELECT A.BOARDGAME_TYPE_CODE , A.BOARDGAME_NAME , A.SOLD_OUT_YN , A.TOTAL_COUNT , A.DEFAULT_RENTAL_FEE , A.MANUFACTURING_COMPANY , A.BRAND , A.S_RENTAL_FEE , A.A_RENTAL_FEE , A.B_RENTAL_FEE , A.S_STATE , A.A_STATE , A.B_STATE , B.CATEGORY_NAME FROM TB_BOARDGAME_TYPE A JOIN TB_BOARDGAME_CATEGORY B ON (A.BOARDGAME_CATEGORY_CODE = B.BOARDGAME_CATEGORY_CODE) ORDER BY BOARDGAME_TYPE_CODE ) P ) WHERE RN <= #{ endRow } AND RN >= #{ startRow }

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RN , P.* FROM ( SELECT A.BOARDGAME_TYPE_CODE , A.BOARDGAME_NAME , A.SOLD_OUT_YN , A.TOTAL_COUNT , A.DEFAULT_RENTAL_FEE , A.MANUFACTURING_COMPANY , A.BRAND , A.S_RENTAL_FEE , A.A_RENTAL_FEE , A.B_RENTAL_FEE , A.S_STATE , A.A_STATE , A.B_STATE , B.CATEGORY_NAME FROM TB_BOARDGAME_TYPE A JOIN TB_BOARDGAME_CATEGORY B ON (A.BOARDGAME_CATEGORY_CODE = B.BOARDGAME_CATEGORY_CODE) WHERE A.BOARDGAME_TYPE_CODE = #{searchProductDTO.boardgameTypeCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} OR A.BOARDGAME_NAME = #{searchProductDTO.boardgameName, jdbcType=VARCHAR} OR A.BRAND = NVL(#{searchProductDTO.brand ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '') OR A.DEFAULT_RENTAL_FEE BETWEEN #{searchProductDTO.minFee} AND #{searchProductDTO.maxFee} ORDER BY BOARDGAME_TYPE_CODE ) P ) WHERE RN <= #{ selectCriteria.endRow } AND RN >= #{ selectCriteria.startRow }
